attributes.action: Reimburse HE students tuition fee loan for the academic year 2020/21.
attributes.additional_details:
Students are experiencing a decline in the quality of lectures due to online delivery, which frequently encounter technical difficulties due to inadequate resources. In addition, university campuses are more or less closed to day students travelling in, meaning that we are essentially paying £9,250 to stay at home and receive impaired information. 
The decreased quality of the university experience as a whole should be compensated by some financial relief from the Government.
attributes.background: Students in HE believe that the standard of lecture delivery and overall experience at university has been heavily impacted by the Covid-19 Pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814
